smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onSharedPreferenceChanged is nested too deeply.
Function onActivityResult is nested too deeply.
Function onActivityResult is nested too deeply.
Function onActivityResult is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onViewCreated is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function addEventToAdapter is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function generateActivity is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function generateEvent is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface Client is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Interface 'Client' with '27' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'EventActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.
This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class EventActivity is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: PrintStackTrace
smells.description: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

instances.message: Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.
Do not print an stack trace. These debug statements should be replaced with a logger or removed.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

activity cannot be safely cast to EventActivity.
activity cannot be safely cast to EventActivity.
activity cannot be safely cast to EventActivity?.
context.getSystemService(Context.LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to LayoutInflater.
results.values cannot be safely cast to List<User>.
result cannot be safely cast to User.
getSerialNumberForUser.invoke(userManager, myUserHandle) cannot be safely cast to Long.
searchItem.actionView cannot be safely cast to SearchView.
getSystemService(Context.SEARCH_SERVICE) cannot be safely cast to SearchManager.
response.body() cannot be safely cast to User.
post_like_counter?.text cannot be safely cast to String.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of UniversalSearchResults.

There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of SignInActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: fr.insapp.insapp.models.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'fr.insapp.insapp.models.Event' is unused.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.dropdown_textview)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: view.findViewById<TextView>(R.id.dropdown_textview)

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
